name: ChartTrendline
description: This object represents the attributes for a chart trendline object.

properties.name: format
properties.description: Represents the formatting of a chart trendline.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Represents the Type of a chart trendline.

properties.name: polynomialOrder
properties.description: Represents the PolynomialOrder of a chart trendline, specific for trendline with Polynomial type.

properties.name: movingAveragePeriod
properties.description: Represents the MovingAveragePeriod of a chart trendline, specific for trendline with MovingAverage type.
